about: I am a Software Engineering student at Instituto Superior de Engenharia de Lisboa (ISEL), since I was a kid I always have had a passion for computers and technology.
I love what I do, particularly Web Development. I have been developed some self and academic projects which are available on my GitHub.
I have experience with programing languages such as Kotlin, JavaScript, Java, C and Python. I am also familiar with many tools and frameworks related to programing.
Beyond my passion for technology I am also in love with water sports, speccialy surfing, I love beach life.

points: Crafted responsive web applications utilizing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Leveraged React to build interactive and user-friendly web interfaces.
Utilized Webpack for bundling assets and Postman for API testing.
Developed robust databases to support application functionality.
Implemented server-side logic using Node.js and Express frameworks.
Created and consumed APIs to enhance application interactivity.
I am familiar with many progaming Languages which allows me to think in different ways to solve a problem.
I use tools like Git, GitHub, InteliJ IDEA, Visual Studio Code, PyCharm and others.
